text: Kristin Cavallari. Photo : Courtesy We all buy clothes, but no two people shop the same. It can be a social experience, and a deeply personal one ; at times, it can be impulsive and entertaining, at others, purpose - driven, a chore. Where do you shop? When do you shop? How do you decide what you need, how much to spend and what's ` ` you''? These are some of the questions we're putting to prominent figures in our column ` ` How I Shop.''
